00195     namespace detail
00196     {
00197         // we need to specialize the create_default template (used in hold_any) 
00198         // to be able to create a truly default constructed service (empty 
00199         // facade)
00200         template<>
00201         struct create_default<saga::cpr::service>
00202         {
00203             static saga::cpr::service* call()
00204             {
00205                 return new saga::cpr::service(1);    // use dummy constructor
00206             }
00207             template <typename T_> static void call(T_* obj) 
00208             { 
00209                 new (obj) saga::cpr::service(1); 
00210             }
00211         };
00212     }
